ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Question
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh. S okay. I often can t remember my own age when asked.. I have trouble retaining information these days. My memory sucks. luv, -Su ... Geforce2 ... of ...
ygData.messageBody:
Heh. S'okay. I often can't remember my own age when asked..
I have trouble retaining information these days. My memory sucks.
luv,
-Su


> Hey Su!
> Ok I seriously had a brain fart! I dont have Voodoo3; I have Verto
Geforce2
> mx400 with 64mb of ram. I really don't know how I pulled that one off!
> Sincerely,
> Deidre
>
> >Not only do the vendors not support them, the company that made them sold
> >to
> >Nvidia. When I had a problem with a newly bought Voodoo3, I contacted the
> >company who informed me that the new company did not honor the warrenties
> >of
> >the previous company so I was s.o.l.
> >If you can afford a better video card, I suggest you get one. I think a
> >GeForce 2 or 3 MX is ok.
> >luv,
> >-Su
> >
> >the problem with Voodoo 3 cards is that it's hard to get updated drivers
> >for
> >them cause most vendors don't support them any more. But my suggestion
> >would be to try updating the drivers to the latest possible.
> >
> >Also look on EQ's technical support site to see if any of their solutions
> >match your problem.
> >
> >Wulfric
> >
> >
> >
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: Deidre Choksy
> > To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> > Sent: Friday, August 16, 2002 1:39 PM
> > Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Question
> >
> >
> > Hi Rob,
> > I have the Luclin expansion. My video card is a Voodoo 3 with 64mb
of
> >ram
> > in it. I'm not sure what's going on! This only started happening
awhile
> > ago... and I haven't changed anything with my computer... I even
> >uninstalled
> > a bunch of crap to try and make more room... *shrugs*
> > Sincerely,
> > Deidre
> >
> > >What expansion do you have? Meaning Lucling, Trilogy,
> > >etc.
> > >
> > >The reason I ask is if it is Luclin, chances are your
> > >video memory is not enough for the rendering, not the
> > >RAM of the system. If you have 500MB of Ram, you have
> > >plenty to run the game.
> > >
> > >Do you know what video card you have and how much
> > >Video Ram it can handle. For instance, if I run
> > >Luclin on my laptop, the people show up naked....lol
> > >
> > >So your symptoms are different but I bet similar in
> > >cause.
> > >
> > >Let us know
> > >
> > >Rob
> > >
> > >
> > >--- electrum101 <electrum101@...> wrote:
> > > > Hey Everybody,
> > > > I'm new to the list! I have a general question that
> > > > hasen't been
> > > > answered for a few months now. I'm hoping one of you
> > > > might know what
> > > > the heck is going on! Ok, so this is what's
> > > > happening;
> > > > Whenever I zone my characters face will change!?!?!
> > > > I'm thinking it
> > > > has something to do with low memory but I have about
> > > > 500mb of ram.
> > > > And I'm not too keen on computers so if there is
> > > > another form of
> > > > memory that could be lacking please enlighten me!
> > > > This stupid problem
> > > > has coused me to quit playing for awhile. It makes
> > > > me sooo mad!!!!
> > > > Sincerely,
> > > > Deidre
> > > >
